channel.title: Project: Advanced Server List
channel.description:
Hey all.
Long story short, I am going to be coding a BETTER server list / server status page.
Features will include: • Server list (Duh) • Sort by: Type (Silab/mopar), Uptime, Name, Port, etc • Names, descriptions • Updates every 5 minutes • Number of players online, list of players - This will list players on any server you can check. This does require the server admin add a java file to his server, which I will code and offer for download.
Progress - • Java Backend - 98% • PHP Server List - 20%
Link: No like yet, Sorry!
Stay tuned, all!

item.title: Project: Advanced Server List
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:9, topic:191781”][quote author=Cain_ link=topic=255454.msg2143505#msg2143505 date=1206779387]
This community - i’m sorry to say - is starting to become full of imbeciles like yourself (excluding a couple of people). Yeah i spam, but what does that have to do with intelligence? hell, what your making would be/is easy as fuck. Also it would not be “contributing” to this community (this isn’t moparisthebest.com). To have my intelligence questioned by an idiot like yourself is quite hilarious. I don’t claim to be real smart, but i’m obviously smarter than you.
And are you sure your host (probably a free one, but I might be wrong) even supports JSP?

P.S. i cannot be fucked with this community anymore, that is why i cannot be fucked to follow the rules, i couldn’t care less if i get banned from these forums - as much fun it is to spam and annoy people.

[/quote]

sdfu ur gay[/quote]
Fuck off back to moparisthebest.com, better yet, piss off from life, you Certified Java Programmer.
What a load of fucking bullshit.

Read full topic

item.title: Project: Advanced Server List
item.dc:creator: @Moptop Moptop
item.description:
@Moptop wrote:

Its called last week of school before spring break. Crammed with tests. SOME of us care about things other then little scripts.

Also, my host has problems with fsockopen(), they seem to like blocking outgoing ports. So I’m working on that too.

What do YOU create for the community - lets look at some of your posts -

Cain_:

NIGGER NIGGER NIGGER NIGGER NIGGER

Cain_:

omg… stupid fuck.

Interesting. Anyone else notice anything?

Next time if you ever THINK someone ‘sucks’, just remember you have the intelligence of an infant ferret, and don’t even listen to yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Project: Advanced Server List
item.dc:creator: @Moptop Moptop
item.description:
@Moptop wrote:

Yeah, timeout will be 1 second max. Sounds low? It’s not. If you’re playing on a server with 1 second ping, it would take 1 second between your click and your character’s movements, which would be horrible lag. So, any server that doesn’t make that cutoff, is crap.

Read full topic

item.title: Project: Advanced Server List
item.dc:creator: @Moptop Moptop
item.description:
@Moptop wrote:

Hey all.

Long story short, I am going to be coding a BETTER server list / server status page.

Features will include:
• Server list (Duh)
• Sort by: Type (Silab/mopar), Uptime, Name, Port, etc
• Names, descriptions
• Updates every 5 minutes
• Number of players online, list of players
- This will list players on any server you can check. This does require the server admin add a java file to his server, which I will code and offer for download.

Progress -
• Java Backend - 98%
• PHP Server List - 20%

Link: No like yet, Sorry!

Stay tuned, all!
